## PackagesAPI.applyPkg() method

Apply or dry-run an Influx package. See [https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/\#operation/ApplyPkg](https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/#operation/ApplyPkg)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
applyPkg(request: ApplyPkgRequest, requestOptions?: RequestOptions): Promise<PkgSummary>;
```

|  request | [ApplyPkgRequest](./influxdb-client-apis.applypkgrequest.md) | request parameters and body (if supported) |
|  requestOptions | [RequestOptions](./influxdb-client-apis.requestoptions.md) | optional transport options |
